channel.title: This is what happens when anyone tries to run my client. anyone except me
channel.description:
i uploaded my client to a page where it can be downloaded. when someone tries to run it, it says: "could not find the main class: Gui. program will exit." the title of the program is: Java Virtual Machine Launcher. i really need help with it. i have no idea how to fix this. if anyone can fix this, i will be grateful. i found this information by downloading it on my other computer. and for an extra thing, i found this... it couldn't help me, but it might help you:
That's a classpath error. javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui This line is basically saying to the JVM: Look in the current directory for a file called Gui.class and try to load it and run it's main method. Classes you may need (even Gui.class) may also be in a file called Theme.jar. Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit That's the JVM telling you: Hey, I couldn't find that Gui.class file were you told me it was. Do you see a Gui.class file in the same directory as your batch file?

item.title: This is what happens when anyone tries to run my client. anyone except me
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Then they need to learn how to modify their batch file so it works?..

item.title: This is what happens when anyone tries to run my client. anyone except me
item.dc:creator: @son_of_satin son of satin
item.description:
@son_of_satin wrote:

i uploaded my client to a page where it can be downloaded. when someone tries to run it, it says: “could not find the main class: Gui. program will exit.” the title of the program is: Java Virtual Machine Launcher. i really need help with it. i have no idea how to fix this. if anyone can fix this, i will be grateful. i found this information by downloading it on my other computer. and for an extra thing, i found this… it couldn’t help me, but it might help you:

That’s a classpath error.
javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
This line is basically saying to the JVM:
Look in the current directory for a file called Gui.class and try to load it and run it’s main method. Classes you may need (even Gui.class) may also be in a file called Theme.jar.
Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit
That’s the JVM telling you:
Hey, I couldn’t find that Gui.class file were you told me it was.
Do you see a Gui.class file in the same directory as your batch file?

Read full topic
